alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 30 at 8:48AM MST until January 31 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST TUESDAY ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 5000 feet. Snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, with amounts above 5 inches above 7000 feet. * WHERE...Areas above 5000 feet near Grand Canyon, Jacob Lake, North Rim and Valle. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Snow forecast from 9 AM Today to 5 AM Tuesday: Grand Canyon 4 to 6 inches Jacob Lake 4 to 8 inches North Rim 4 to 6 inches Valle 1 to 3 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau
